Also, FunDip and I debate the transgender/Planet Fitness controversy and FunDip makes an embarrassing admission… Transcript

item.title: #13 Dr. Boniface Talks Marijuana + FunDip Gets High On Painkillers! | Louder with Crowder
item.description: Podcast Description This week, Dr. Phyllis Bonafice stopped by to discuss the ins and outs of Marijuana usage and it’s legalization. We also go through the #LAPDShooting point by point, Hillary’s recent email scandal and listen to FunDip as he progressively gets more and more loopy on his newest pain-meds. Transcript

item.title: #12 Net Neutrality Oh No! With James Okeefe and Brett McKay | Louder with Crowder
item.description: Podcast Description This week we show you the ins and outs of Net Neutrality and debunk the “equal pay” myths as propagated by feminists. James Okeefe joins us to break news on his latest sting against Al Sharpton and Brett McKay tells us what it’s like to be a man in modern America! Transcript

item.title: #11 The Science Against Porn, Free Speech and Kurt Schlicter | Louder with Crowder
item.description: Podcast Description This week on Louder With Crowder, we start off dealing with the news of the week. Obama, ISIS, Rudy Giuliani and the like. But we also have a fascinating discussion with Gary Wilson, author of “Your Brain on Porn” as we discuss the physiological and cultural ramifications coming from a generation raised with online pornography. The data is staggering. You can watch our interview on the video-cast, or listen to it on the go with the full audio podcast below!

item.title: #10 Vegan Myths Debunked, Chapel Hill Shooting & Free Speech! | Louder with Crowder
item.description: Podcast Description We had a full week this week! Brian Williams was suspended without pay for 6 months. An Atheist progressive opened fire on 3 innocent Muslims and University of Michigan took one more step toward banning free speech. We discuss all of that in this week’s Louder With Crowder, but more importantly, I was joined by radical feminist, environmentalist Lierre Keith. Surprisingly, we agreed on a lot and she educated us on some of the most common, but patently false vegetarian myths and claims!

item.title: #9 Chael Sonnen Guests, Obama’s Isis/Christian Comparison & Brian Williams Lies. | Louder with Crowder
item.description: Podcast Description This week was a BIG podcast. We had Chael Sonnen on for a full 40 minutes to discuss his pro-life stance on becoming a father (At the 2 min mark), PED’s in sports and who the greatest fighter of all time truly is! We also went into detail about Obama’s absurd comparison between Christians/ISIS at the presidential prayer breakfast and of course, Brian Williams being caught in more lies.

item.title: #8 Michael Loftus, Ed Morrissey and The “N word.” | Louder with Crowder
item.description: Podcast Description This week on the podcast we were joined by the wonder Michael Loftus and Ed Morrissey. American Sniper, Michael Moore and Kevin Costner admitting to using the “N” word were all discussed. Download it, subscribe on iTunes or watch the clips below! So on CNN, Kevin Costner admitted to having used the N word. Many times. So what? Does that make him a racist? Watch for yourself and decide on whether the context matters in this instance.

item.title: #7 Dean Cain Backs Up Talk, Imam Choudary Threatens Death! | Louder with Crowder
item.description: Podcast Description This week was a slam-bang episode of “Louder With Crowder.” Firstly, the one and onlyDean Cain stops by to discuss his Michael Moore comments. Not only did he double-down, but he backed them up in style, as only superman himself could! He also gave some insight on “American Sniper” Chris Kyle. Not only that, but Imam Anjem Choudary stopped by. For REAL. Not a joke. He told us how he plans to bring Shariah to Britain, America and his support for the current regimes in Iraq and Syria.

item.title: #6 Offended or offensive? Podcast! | Louder with Crowder
item.description: Podcast Description Enough with political correctness! It’s time westop worrying about being offensive. In fact, sometimes we need to be offensive! Andrew Klavan joined me on this week’s podcast to explain… Also in this episode, Krystal Heath chats with us about people who hate children, and Jordan Crowder’s here to talk about how oh-so-progressive Hollywood managed to give us an all-white Oscars this year. Tune in belowor subscribe for every episode on iTunes!

item.title: #5 Paris Attacks and #FreeCommunityCollege Dummies | Louder with Crowder
item.description: Podcast Description What kind of culture argues that it is because of the “grace of god” that a 14 year old girl can be legally married? One founded by a pedophile, that’s which one. Chris Ford, Gerald Morgan and a terrorist joined us for today’s podcast to break down the disgrace that is Allah. Tune in as we discuss the latest madness in the world… and,here’sa video with some show highlights to whet your appetite!

item.title: #4 The Top Historical Arguments for Christmas & Jesus! | Louder with Crowder
item.description: Podcast Description This one’s a must-listen. Our good friend, apologetics specialist Gerald Morgan stopped by for two whole hours (starting at 16:00) to make the historical and scientific case for Christmas, why it happened and just the kind of impact that it had on the world. Did Jesus exist? Where/when was he born? Why do so many people miss it? Do not miss! This week, yes we were joined by the fantastic Michelle Malkin.

item.title: #3 Does U.S. Condone “Torture” or Are We Just Pansies? | Louder with Crowder
item.description: Podcast Description In this week’s podcast, we discuss the CIA/torture scandal, the #WarOnWomen and the #EricGarner choke case with UFC Champ Pat Miletich. Do Americans condone torture? How is it defined? Have we generally just become a nation of unqualified pansies? Special guests: Gerald Morgan and Krystal Heath! Transcript

item.title: #2 Are Cops Racist? Do Chokeholds Kill? | Louder with Crowder
item.description: Podcast Description SUBSCRIBE ON ITUNES This week we’re joined by the fantastic John Hawkins of RightWingNews.com, and the lovely Kate Bryan of Acculterated and LiveActionFilms. We were also joined by Rener Gracie, but the audio was corrupted, so we’ll get him back this month. We discuss the increasingly destructive Ferguson riots, racist cops, Chris Rock’s recent, racist statements and exactly what happened in the famous New York chokehold case. Also, FunDip discusses his trips to the grocery store.

item.title: #1 My French Mom Calls on Immigration! + Guests! | Louder with Crowder
item.description: Podcast Description SUBSCRIBE ON ITUNES FOR FREE! This week, Obama gave his speech/plans on immigration. The short end: it’s a fast-track to get illegal immigrants their green card. You know who’s not happy about that? MY MOM! French-Canadian mamma Crowder calls in to tell us what it was like to immigrate here LEGALLY. Don’t miss her hilarious, broken-english rant. Also, my dad counters with HIS experience in immigrating to French Canada.
